attributes.action: stop Boots the chemist charging for delivering vital medications
attributes.additional_details:
There is no other chemist on canvey island Essex that provide medications in blister packs.
This is vital for them to receive meds this way as they get quite confused as to when to take them
attributes.background:
My parents are now having to pay boots to deliver their medications as they come in blister packs .
If they have the postal service the blister packs would no longer be available 
Boots now think it’s ok to charge £5 per delivery each person

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for Boots Pharmacy, rather than the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could raise the issue with them. You can find out how to contact the company here:

http://www.boots-uk.com/about-boots-uk/company-information/contact-us/
